verse.roman:
tasyāḥ prādurabhūt tāta
bhagavān ādi-puruṣaḥ
pīta-vāsāś catur-bāhuḥ
śaṅkha-cakra-gadā-dharaḥ

synonyms: tasyāḥ—before her; prādurabhūt—appeared; tāta—my dear King; bhagavān—the Supreme Personality of Godhead; ādi-puruṣaḥ—the original person; pīta-vāsāḥ—dressed in yellow garments; catuḥ-bāhuḥ—with four arms; śaṅkha-cakra-gadā-dharaḥ—bearing the conchshell, disc, club and lotus flower.
translation: My dear King, the original Supreme Personality of Godhead, dressed in yellow garments and bearing a conchshell, disc, club and lotus in His four hands, then appeared before Aditi.
